item.g:title: Tan Brown Silk and Jacquard Embroidered Wedding and Festival Blazer
item.g:description: Tan Brown embroidered wedding blazer intricate with zari thread, resham thraed, floral work and leaf work.This blazer has full buttoned placket on the front, welt pocket on left side of chest.This is stitched and available upto size 38 inches.Charges will be extra for sizes beyond 44.This product can be made upto size 52 inches.Shoes will be charged extra depending on their design.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Sizes will be assumed to be exact body measurements.

item.g:title: Fallow Brown Silk and Jacquard Embroidered Wedding and Festival Blazer
item.g:description: Fallow Brown embroidered wedding blazer intricate with zari thread, buttons, resham thraed, floral work and leaf work.This blazer has full buttoned placket on the front, welt pocket on left side of chest.This is stitched and available upto size 44 inches.Charges will be extra for sizes beyond 44.This product can be made upto size 52 inches.Shoes will be charged extra depending on their design.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Sizes will be assumed to be exact body measurements.
